description: Non-invasive deep brain stimulation involves techniques that stimulate brain regions without the need for surgical intervention. This approach aims to modulate brain activity to treat neurological disorders and enhance brain function.
you_have_this_if: You are exploring treatments for neurological conditions.
You require a method to influence deep brain structures without surgery.
You are conducting research on brain function modulation.
You are interested in the effects of neuromodulation on behavior.
You have access to advanced imaging technologies for targeting.

approaches.best_for: when you need to target deep brain structures non-invasively and study neuromodulation effects.
approaches.key_tradeoff: While TUS is non-invasive, it may have limitations in precision compared to invasive methods.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need a non-invasive method to stimulate deep brain areas for research or therapeutic purposes.

start_here: Start with Transcranial Ultrasound Stimulation (TUS) as it provides a non-invasive option for targeting deep brain structures effectively.
